attributes.action: Recognise Officially Parental Abuse is very real and exists.
attributes.additional_details: Recognise officially any form of parental abuse exists and is wrong. Stop the denigration/humiliation and abuse on parents by a state or official let alone by young persons. To include criminally responsible children of a certain age and onwards who are abusive towards their parents in any shape or form. Stop abuse from any person including state and officials on parents who are innocent and never been proven guilty of anything in an open court and with a jury. Stop Libel and abuse on parents. Stop abuse from a state on  innocent parents . Stop treating parents as second class citizens. Stop humiliating parents. Debate & vote nationwide on stopping parental abuse. Stop a two tier power system one for criminals more favourable for them and one for parents treated as even lower class when dealing with aspects of children and family law.
